main event: A UFO sighting report was filed on 02/07/51 in Indianapolis, Indiana.
interesting points: The sighting involves 1 unidentified flying object reported by a civilian,The document is part of the historical Project Blue Book program, which investigated UFOs,The report references a disc of aircraft clipped from a magazine,Photos were taken but are not present in the document,The observation length and course of the object were not detailed.
